Package video_poker

This package implements the main Video Poker classes and Methods.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Mode
    Interface for specifying different game modes
    Score
    Interface for a hand evaluator class
    Statistics
    Statistics class for keeping track of hand occurrences and displaying relevant stats
    Strategy
    Strategy interface for providing in-game advice and optimal playing
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Card
    Public Card Class
    Card.CardComparator
    CardComparator Object Allows to sort card by ascending rank enum (Ace low)
    Card.CardComparatorAceHigh
    CardComparator Object Allows to sort card by ascending rank enum (Ace high)
    DebugMode
    Debug Game Mode
    Deck
    Represents the deck of cards
    DoubleBonus10_7
    Double Bonus 10/7 Video Poker Variant
    Game
    Main game class
    GUIMode  
    Hand
    A player's hand of cards
    InteractiveMode
    Interactive Game Mode
    Main
    Main class.
    Options
    Simplified command-line argument framework
    Player
    Represents a player
    ScoreDB10_7  
    SimulationMode
    Simulation Game Mode
    StatisticsDB10_7
    Double Bonus 10/7 Game Statistics
    StrategyDB10_7
    Double Bonus 10/7 Optimal Strategy
    Utils  
    Variant
    Defines a generic game variant properties
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Rank
    Represents a card rank
    Suit
    Enum for representing a playing card suit
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DeckEmptyException
    Exception thrown when one tries to draw a card from an empty deck
    InsufficientCreditException
    Exception thrown when one tries to get more credit than a user has

Package video_poker Description

This package implements the main Video Poker classes and Methods. Contains main method for program execution
